post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Hi Comm-oners
I have been working as a volunteer of Mississauga Centural Library for 3 months now. I was trying to get book donation without the results.
- I tried Churchs first no luck because they have their own library - Contact Korean Newpapers no lucks Korea Times : not enough personnel to manage Jung Ang : told me that potential 2000 books but didn't work out. no new books
I need you help. Please let me know if you have the books you like to share with others
post.title: I need your help : Book donation
